Translations.Text: Kandi nta kindi twakoherereje usibye kuba utanga inkuru nziza (yo kuzagororerwa ijuru ku bazumvira Allah) ndetse n’umuburizi (ku bazigomeka)

Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ntabwo (kubagezaho ubutumwa) mbibasabira igihembo, ariko uzashaka gukurikira inzira imuganisha kwa Nyagasani we (yemerewe kugira icyo atanga mu nzira ya Allah ku bushake bwe)
Ujye uniringira Uhoraho, Udapfa, unasingize ishimwe rye. Kandi arahagije kuba azi byimazeyo ibyaha by’abagaragu be
We waremye ibirere n’isi ndetse n’ibiri hagati yabyo mu minsi itandatu, hanyuma Nyirimpuhwe (Allah) aganza ku ntebe y’icyubahiro (Arishi). Bityo (yewe Muhamadi) mubaze ibijyanye nawe (akwibwire)
N’iyo (abahakanyi) babwiwe bati "Nimwubamire Nyirimpuhwe!" Baravuga bati "Nyirimpuhwe ni nde? Ese tugomba kubamira uwo (wowe Muhamadi) udutegetse?" Nuko ibyo bikabongerera guhunga (ukuri)
Ubutagatifu ni ubwa (Allah) washyize mu kirere inyenyeri nini, akanashyiramo itara ryaka (izuba) ndetse n’ukwezi kumurika
Ni na we washyizeho ugusimburana kw’ijoro n’amanywa (kugira ngo bibere isomo) wawundi ushaka gutekereza cyangwa gushimira
Kandi abagaragu ba Nyirimpuhwe ni babandi bagenda ku isi biyoroheje. N’iyo injiji zibavugishije (amagambo mabi) baravuga bati "Amahoro
Ni nabo barara amajoro (basingiza) Nyagasani wabo bubamye, banahagaze
Ni nabo bavuga bati "Nyagasani wacu! Dukize ibihano by’umuriro wa Jahanamu, kubera ko mu by’ukuri, ibihano byawo bizahoraho
Mu by’ukuri, (umuriro) ni ho hantu habi ho kuba no gutura
Ni nabo igihe batanze (mu byo batunze), ntibasesagura cyangwa ngo bagundire. Ahubwo bajya hagati y’ibyo byombi
